subtests.name: Can set 'column-width' to CSS-wide keywords: initial
Can set 'column-width' to CSS-wide keywords: inherit
Can set 'column-width' to CSS-wide keywords: unset
Can set 'column-width' to CSS-wide keywords: revert
Can set 'column-width' to var() references:  var(--A)
Can set 'column-width' to the 'auto' keyword: auto
Can set 'column-width' to a length: calc(0px + 0em)
Setting 'column-width' to a percent throws TypeError
Setting 'column-width' to a time throws TypeError
Setting 'column-width' to an angle throws TypeError
Setting 'column-width' to a flexible length throws TypeError
Setting 'column-width' to a number throws TypeError
Setting 'column-width' to a URL throws TypeError
Setting 'column-width' to a transform throws TypeError
